text: ennal avarkk mumpuntayirunnavarute paryavasanam ennaneyayirunnu enn kanan avar bhumiyil sancariccu neakkiyittille? avar ivarekkal ennam kutiyavarum, saktikeantum bhumiyil vitteccupeaya avasistannal keantum erravum prabalanmarumayirunnu. ennittum avar netiyetuttirunnateannum avarkk prayeajanappettilla
